Title: Haeckel's Tale
Plot: Based on Clive Barker's short story. While on his way to see his sick father, Ernest Haeckel takes shelter with an elderly man and his young wife but soon discovers their horrible secret...
GuestStars: Christopher Delisle,  Elizabeth McQuade,  Jill Morrison,  Warren Kimmel,  Pablo Coffey,  Jon Polito,  Micki Maunsell,  Gerard Plunkett,  Tom McBeath,  Leela Savasta,  Derek Cecil,  Steve Bacic
